name: OutScape (itch)
description:
I started making this game alongside the Brackeys Unity tutorial (playlist here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j48LtUkZRjU&list=PLPV2KyIb3jR5QFsefuO2RlAgWEz6EvVi6). However I soon branched off and made it look better in a Vapowave/Outrun/80s aesthetic. I also added more features than standing blocks. This project has been my Unity learning course and I hope I won´t stop here.

The game currently only features 1 short playable level.

The final version should feature 3 levels.
